data.title: Top 12 Berlin-Heinersdorf Vacation Rentals, Apartments & Hotels
data.meta_description: Find great apartments, vacation rentals and private rooms in Berlin-Heinersdorf. Book private accommodations in Berlin-Heinersdorf with 9flats.com
data.text:
Instant Booking

Other

Monteurzimmer Berlin Pankow mit Dachterrasse - Nur 10 min. von der A10 - 3 Zimmer/ 7 Betten

Monteurzimmer Berlin Pankow mit Dachterrasse - Nur 10 min. Von der A10 - 3 Zimmer/ 7 Betten is located in the Pankow district of Berlin, 6.6 km from Alexanderplatz Underground Station, 6.9 km from Alexanderplatz and 7.7 km from Memorial of the Berlin Wall. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. Guests can access the guest house via private entrance.Book now

from $87 per night

Instant Booking

Apartment

Golden Loft Berlin

Situated within 6.3 km of Alexanderplatz Underground Station and 6.6 km of Alexanderplatz in Berlin, Golden Loft Berlin features accommodation with seating area. Among the facilities at this property are private check-in and check-out and bicycle parking, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment has family rooms.Book now

from $66 per night

Instant Booking

Apartment

Gartenhaus

Gartenhaus is located in the Pankow district of Berlin, 6.8 km from Memorial of the Berlin Wall, 7 km from Alexanderplatz Underground Station and 7.6 km from Berlin Cathedral. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are accessible at the apartment free of charge. The property is non-smoking and is set 6.7 km from Alexanderplatz.Book now

from $82 per night

Instant Booking

Other

Pension Haus Bielke

This family-run guest house is quietly situated in green surroundings in Berlin's Weißensee district, a 15-minute walk from the Weißer See lake. It is under 15 minutes by public transport from Prenzlauer Berg, and under 30 minutes from Alexanderplatz square.Book now

from $73 per night

Instant Booking

Apartment

Schöne urbane Wohnung am Weißen See

Offering inner courtyard views, Schöne urbane Wohnung am Weißen See is an accommodation situated in Berlin, 5.6 km from Alexanderplatz and 6.4 km from Berlin Cathedral. Housed in a building dating from 1930, this apartment is 6.4 km from Memorial of the Berlin Wall and 6.6 km from Berlin TV Tower. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Alexanderplatz Underground Station is 5.3 km away.Book now

from $87 per night

Instant Booking

Apartment

2-Zimmerwohnung

Offering garden views, 2-Zimmerwohnung is an accommodation situated in Berlin, 7.3 km from Memorial of the Berlin Wall and 7.5 km from Alexanderplatz Underground Station. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 7.2 km from Alexanderplatz.Book now

from $60 per night

Instant Booking

Apartment

Schöne Wohnung am See

Schöne Wohnung am See is situated in the Pankow district of Berlin, 5.6 km from Alexanderplatz, 6.4 km from Berlin Cathedral and 6.4 km from Memorial of the Berlin Wall. The property is set 6.6 km from Berlin TV Tower, 6.6 km from German Historical Museum and 6.7 km from Neues Museum. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Alexanderplatz Underground Station is 5.3 km away.Book now

from $87 per night

Instant Booking

Other

GASTEM UG

Featuring city views, GASTEM UG offers accommodation with patio, around 6.4 km from Alexanderplatz. Boasting a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. Guests can enjoy inner courtyard views.Book now

from $87 per night
